snippet.title: Evercade - Gremlin Collection 2 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Gremlin returns to Evercade with the explosive action of Loaded and Re-Loaded, the comedic mayhem of Hogs of War and the adventure racing of Buggy.

Comes with a full-colour manual and all four 32-bit games on one physical Evercade Giga Cart, compatible with all Evercade and Super Pocket systems.

£24.99, $29.99, €29.99
Release: June 2025
Pre-order: April 1, 2025

Find out more: https://evercade.co.uk/cartridges/gremlin-collection-2/
Evercade Retailers: https://evercade.co.uk/retailers
